data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=louBCBO0cdoQ7kNvgExW3mk&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AiNY6-ScwvPNizt-hzeX0go&oh=00_AYB5yI3LYbYFi2DwtdE0An6zte1Ilw_S5P9FF9HtEqnKoQ&oe=66EFFDB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gu3GqOGBBrEQ7kNvgHq_XO-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AiNY6-ScwvPNizt-hzeX0go&oh=00_AYDx8HE9etXPBzMmo0IJgYqiMquNNOj-J-PJ_2wboaH7SQ&oe=66F00B52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qXWaBWh2qTwQ7kNvgEHwWFu&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AiNY6-ScwvPNizt-hzeX0go&oh=00_AYCOc0_DxMaj1Z5tt3D-YOZZhZZCFKVGGjnvoBhGoub9hg&oe=66EFF689)
